requirements.plaintext: Complete Song of the Dragon and Freedom

steps.plaintext: Start the quest by talking to Cyrus near the Adventurers' Guild Headquarters or Angel's Share in Mondstadt.
steps.markdown: Start the quest by talking to ◀Cyrus▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Cyrus▷ near the ◀Adventurers' Guild▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Adventurers%27_Guild▷ Headquarters or ◀Angel's Share▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Angel%27s_Share▷ in Mondstadt.

steps.plaintext: Check the suspicious location and eliminate any threats (0/3)
steps.markdown: Check the suspicious location and eliminate any threats (0/3)

substeps.plaintext: Use the navigate button in the quest menu to find the areas
substeps.markdown: Use the navigate button in the quest menu to find the areas
